/usr/bin/c++   -pedantic -Wall -Wextra -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-unused-function  -fmessage-length=0 -fvisibility=hidden -Wall -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-unused-function -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/modern_billard.dir/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/modern_billard.dir/billard.cc.o  -o modern_billard -Wl,-rpath,/home/red-sea/COSSIM/hla/certi/build-certi/libRTI/ieee1516-2010:/home/red-sea/COSSIM/hla/certi/build-certi/libCERTI:/home/red-sea/COSSIM/hla/certi/build-certi/libHLA: ../libgraphc/libgraphd.a ../../libRTI/ieee1516-2010/libRTI1516ed.so.1.0.0 ../../libRTI/ieee1516-2010/libFedTime1516ed.so.1.0.0 -lSM -lICE -lX11 ../../libCERTI/libCERTId.so.4.0.0 -lxml2 ../../libHLA/libHLAd.so.4.0.0 -lrt
